kMonInit.Notes: The index at which the Monte Carlo campaign is started (combined with MCFlag, this can be used to rerun one specific test of the campaign)

NmonOrg.Notes: Number of Monte Carlo simulations on this subtest.

decimation.Notes: Decimation of the outputs of the Simulink model not related to the thrusters.

decimationTh.Notes: Decimation of the outputs of the Simulink model related to the thrusters.

SmartTriggF.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the smart trigger on the post-processing routing. This can be overridden by the Monte Carlo post-processing routines.

PulsedF.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the use of pulsed thrusters.

MCFlag.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the Monte Carlo loop.
